snippet.title: Indie Game 《Where are the creatures of mountains and seas》
snippet.description:
Where Are the Creatures of Mountains and Seas?
Little apprentice Tietou is a disciple of Taishang Laojun and is responsible for guarding the Mountain and Sea Creature Park. One day, he slacked off, and the mythical creatures escaped. These creatures arriving in the mortal world could cause uncontrollable chaos! Tietou must travel across the vast lands of China to recall all the mythical creatures and tribes.

Here, you'll find:

- 12 beautiful Chinese cities
- 1,800 characters
- Over 100 mythical creatures and tribes from the Classic of Mountains and Seas
Explore the beautiful cities of China, learn about the mythical creatures from the great work "The Classic of Mountains and Seas," and embark on a quest to find them all!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2848660/_/
